verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, unto Moses אֱמֹ֥ר <S%H559><s%> 'e-Mor Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-ha-Nim unto the priests בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons אַהֲרֹ֑ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron; of Aaron וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem, about לְנֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> le-Ne-fesh for the dead לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- No יִטַּמָּ֖א <S%H2930><s%> yit-tam-Ma unto them There shall none be defiled בְּעַמָּֽיו׃ <S%H5971><s%> be-'am-Mav. among his people

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- for לִשְׁאֵר֔וֹ <S%H7607><s%> lish-'e-Ro, But for his kin הַקָּרֹ֖ב <S%H7138><s%> hak-ka-Ro that is near אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav; to him לְאִמּ֣וֹ <S%H517><s%> le-'im-Mo unto him [that is] for his mother וּלְאָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> u-le-'a-Viv, and for his father וְלִבְנ֥וֹ <S%H1121><s%> ve-liv-No and for his son וּלְבִתּ֖וֹ <S%H1323><s%> u-le-vit-To and for his daughter וּלְאָחִֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> u-le-'a-Chiv. and for his brother

וְלַאֲחֹת֤וֹ <S%H269><s%> ve-la-'a-cho-To And for his sister הַבְּתוּלָה֙ <S%H1330><s%> hab-be-tu-Lah a virgin הַקְּרוֹבָ֣ה <S%H7138><s%> hak-ke-ro-Vah that is nigh אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to him אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher because לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- no הָיְתָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-ye-Tah has לְאִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> le-'Ish; unto him which hath had no husband לָ֖הּ lah יִטַּמָּֽא׃ <S%H2930><s%> yit-tam-Ma. for her may he be defiled

לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not יִטַּמָּ֖א <S%H2930><s%> yit-tam-Ma [But] he shall not defile בַּ֣עַל <S%H1167><s%> Ba-'al himself [being] a chief man בְּעַמָּ֑יו <S%H5971><s%> be-'am-Mav; among his people לְהֵ֖חַלּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2490><s%> le-He-chal-Lo. to profane

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor; יִקְרְחָה yik-re-chah כיִקְרְח֤וּ <S%H7139><s%> yik-re-Chu make bald קקָרְחָה֙ <S%H7144><s%> ka-re-Chah baldness בְּרֹאשָׁ֔ם <S%H7218><s%> be-ro-Sham, upon their head וּפְאַ֥ת <S%H6285><s%> u-fe-'At the corner זְקָנָ֖ם <S%H2206><s%> ze-ka-Nam of their beard לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor יְגַלֵּ֑חוּ <S%H1548><s%> ye-gal-Le-chu; neither shall they shave off וּבִ֨בְשָׂרָ֔ם <S%H1320><s%> u-Viv-sa-Ram, in their flesh לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor יִשְׂרְט֖וּ <S%H8295><s%> yis-re-Tu nor make שָׂרָֽטֶת׃ <S%H8296><s%> sa-Ra-tet. any cuttings

קְדֹשִׁ֤ים <S%H6918><s%> ke-do-Shim therefore they shall be holy יִהְיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu become לֵאלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> le-Lo-hei-Hem, unto their God וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and not יְחַלְּל֔וּ <S%H2490><s%> ye-chal-le-Lu, and not profane שֵׁ֖ם <S%H8034><s%> shem the name אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Hem; of their God כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אִשֵּׁ֨י <S%H801><s%> 'ish-Shei made by fire יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD לֶ֧חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem [and] the bread אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Hem of their God הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> hem they מַקְרִיבִ֖ם <S%H7126><s%> mak-ri-Vim they do offer וְהָ֥יוּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-Ha-yu become קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh. They shall be holy

אִשָּׁ֨ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah a wife זֹנָ֤ה <S%H2181><s%> zo-Nah [that is] a whore וַחֲלָלָה֙ <S%H2491><s%> va-cha-la-Lah or profane לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor יִקָּ֔חוּ <S%H3947><s%> yik-Ka-chu, They shall not take וְאִשָּׁ֛ה <S%H802><s%> ve-'ish-Shah a woman גְּרוּשָׁ֥ה <S%H1644><s%> ge-ru-Shah put away מֵאִישָׁ֖הּ <S%H376><s%> me-'i-Shah from her husband לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor יִקָּ֑חוּ <S%H3947><s%> yik-Ka-chu; neither shall they take כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for קָדֹ֥שׁ <S%H6918><s%> ka-Dosh for he [is] holy ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he לֵאלֹהָֽיו׃ <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Hav. unto his God

וְקִדַּשְׁתּ֔וֹ <S%H6942><s%> ve-kid-dash-To, Thou shalt sanctify כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- לֶ֥חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem the bread אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha of thy God ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he מַקְרִ֑יב <S%H7126><s%> mak-Riv; him therefore for he offereth קָדֹשׁ֙ <S%H6918><s%> ka-Dosh he shall be holy יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> yih-yeh- become לָּ֔ךְ Lach, כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for קָד֔וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> ka-Doosh, you [am] holy אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto thee for I the LORD מְקַדִּשְׁכֶֽם׃ <S%H6942><s%> me-kad-dish-Chem. which sanctify

וּבַת֙ <S%H1323><s%> u-Vat And the daughter אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish of any כֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> ko-Hen, priest כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki if תֵחֵ֖ל <S%H2490><s%> te-Chel if she profane לִזְנ֑וֹת <S%H2181><s%> liz-Not; herself by playing the whore אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אָבִ֙יהָ֙ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-ha her father הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> hi she מְחַלֶּ֔לֶת <S%H2490><s%> me-chal-Le-let, she profaneth בָּאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> ba-'Esh with fire תִּשָּׂרֵֽף׃ <S%H8313><s%> tis-sa-Ref. she shall be burnt ס sa-Mek

וְהַכֹּהֵן֩ <S%H3548><s%> ve-hak-ko-Hen priest הַגָּד֨וֹל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol And [he that is] the high מֵאֶחָ֜יו <S%H251><s%> me-'e-Chav among his brethren אֲ‍ ֽשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'asher- whose יוּצַ֥ק <S%H3332><s%> yu-Tzak was poured עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and רֹאשׁ֣וֹ׀ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Sho upon whose head שֶׁ֤מֶן <S%H8081><s%> She-men oil הַמִּשְׁחָה֙ <S%H4888><s%> ham-mish-Chah the anointing וּמִלֵּ֣א <S%H4390><s%> u-mil-Le accomplish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do, able לִלְבֹּ֖שׁ <S%H3847><s%> lil-Bosh to put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַבְּגָדִ֑ים <S%H899><s%> hab-be-ga-Dim; on the garments אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רֹאשׁוֹ֙ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Sho his head לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor יִפְרָ֔ע <S%H6544><s%> yif-Ra', shall not uncover וּבְגָדָ֖יו <S%H899><s%> u-ve-ga-Dav his clothes לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor יִפְרֹֽם׃ <S%H6533><s%> yif-Rom. nor rend

וְעַ֛ל <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- any נַפְשֹׁ֥ת <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shot body מֵ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> met to any dead לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor יָבֹ֑א <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo; Neither shall he go in לְאָבִ֥יו <S%H1><s%> le-'a-Viv himself for his father וּלְאִמּ֖וֹ <S%H517><s%> u-le-'im-Mo or for his mother לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor יִטַּמָּֽא׃ <S%H2930><s%> yit-tam-Ma. nor defile

וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- out הַמִּקְדָּשׁ֙ <S%H4720><s%> ham-mik-Dash of the sanctuary לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor יֵצֵ֔א <S%H3318><s%> ye-Tze, Neither shall he go out וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor יְחַלֵּ֔ל <S%H2490><s%> ye-chal-Lel, nor profane אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et מִקְדַּ֣שׁ <S%H4720><s%> mik-Dash the sanctuary אֱלֹהָ֑יו <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hav; of his God כִּ֡י <S%H3588><s%> ki for נֵ֠זֶר <S%H5145><s%> Ne-zer for the crown שֶׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> She-men oil מִשְׁחַ֧ת <S%H4888><s%> mish-Chat of the anointing אֱלֹהָ֛יו <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hav of his God עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav and אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. [is] upon him I [am] the LORD
וְה֕וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu he אִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah a wife בִבְתוּלֶ֖יהָ <S%H1331><s%> viv-tu-Lei-ha in her virginity יִקָּֽח׃ <S%H3947><s%> yik-Kach. And he shall take

אַלְמָנָ֤ה <S%H490><s%> 'al-ma-Nah A widow וּגְרוּשָׁה֙ <S%H1644><s%> u-ge-ru-Shah or a divorced woman וַחֲלָלָ֣ה <S%H2491><s%> va-cha-la-Lah or profane זֹנָ֔ה <S%H2181><s%> zo-Nah, [or] an harlot אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo may not יִקָּ֑ח <S%H3947><s%> yik-Kach; these shall he not take כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo בְּתוּלָ֥ה <S%H1330><s%> be-tu-Lah a virgin מֵעַמָּ֖יו <S%H5971><s%> me-'am-Mav of his own people יִקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> yik-Kach but he shall take אִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah. to wife

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- he will not יְחַלֵּ֥ל <S%H2490><s%> ye-chal-Lel Neither shall he profane זַרְע֖וֹ <S%H2233><s%> zar-'O his seed בְּעַמָּ֑יו <S%H5971><s%> be-'am-Mav; among his people כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God מְקַדְּשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H6942><s%> me-kad-de-Sho. do sanctify פ Peh
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

דַּבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> dab-Ber Speak אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron unto Aaron לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish Whosoever מִֽזַּרְעֲךָ֞ <S%H2233><s%> miz-zar-'a-Cha [he be] of thy seed לְדֹרֹתָ֗ם <S%H1755><s%> le-do-ro-Tam, in their generations אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh has בוֹ֙ vo מ֔וּם <S%H3971><s%> Mum, that hath [any] blemish לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo No יִקְרַ֔ב <S%H7126><s%> yik-Rav, let him not approach לְהַקְרִ֖יב <S%H7126><s%> le-hak-Riv to offer לֶ֥חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem the bread אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hav. of his God

כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all manner אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish For whatsoever man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who בּ֥וֹ bo מ֖וּם <S%H3971><s%> mum [he be] that hath a blemish לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יִקְרָ֑ב <S%H7126><s%> yik-Rav; he shall not approach אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish man עִוֵּר֙ <S%H5787><s%> 'iv-Ver a blind א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or פִסֵּ֔חַ <S%H6455><s%> fis-Se-ach, or a lame א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or חָרֻ֖ם <S%H2763><s%> cha-Rum or he that hath a flat nose א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or שָׂרֽוּעַ׃ <S%H8311><s%> sa-Ru-a'. or any thing superfluous

א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish, Or a man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh has ב֖וֹ vo שֶׁ֣בֶר <S%H7667><s%> She-ver A broken רָ֑גֶל <S%H7272><s%> Ra-gel; foot א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or שֶׁ֥בֶר <S%H7667><s%> She-ver broken יָֽד׃ <S%H3027><s%> Yad. hand

אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or גִבֵּ֣ן <S%H1384><s%> gib-Ben Or crookbackt אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or דַ֔ק <S%H1851><s%> Dak, or a dwarf א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or תְּבַלֻּ֣ל <S%H8400><s%> te-val-Lul or that hath a blemish בְּעֵינ֑וֹ <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-No; in his eye א֤וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or גָרָב֙ <S%H1618><s%> ga-Rav or be scurvy א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or יַלֶּ֔פֶת <S%H3217><s%> yal-Le-fet, or scabbed א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or מְר֥וֹחַ <S%H4790><s%> me-Ro-ach broken אָֽשֶׁךְ׃ <S%H810><s%> 'A-shech. or hath his stones

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all manner אִ֞ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish No man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who בּ֣וֹ bo מ֗וּם <S%H3971><s%> Mum, that hath a blemish מִזֶּ֙רַע֙ <S%H2233><s%> miz-Ze-ra' of the seed אַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron of Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen, the priest לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יִגַּ֔שׁ <S%H5066><s%> yig-Gash, shall come nigh לְהַקְרִ֖יב <S%H7126><s%> le-hak-Riv to offer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אִשֵּׁ֣י <S%H801><s%> 'ish-Shei made by fire יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD מ֣וּם <S%H3971><s%> mum he hath a blemish בּ֔וֹ bo, אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem the bread אֱלֹהָ֔יו <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hav, of his God לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יִגַּ֖שׁ <S%H5066><s%> yig-Gash he shall not come nigh לְהַקְרִֽיב׃ <S%H7126><s%> le-hak-Riv. to offer
